```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r, message = FALSE}
data("ny_noaa")
ny_noaa = 
  ny_noaa %>% 
  select(date, id, tmax, tmin, prcp) %>% 
  mutate(tmax = as.numeric(tmax),
         tmin = as.numeric(tmin),
         year = year(date),
         month = month(date)) %>% 
  filter(year > 1990)
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A: Scatter plot for maximum and minimum temparature in 1991 to 2010 in each weather station


```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
ny_noaa %>% 
  group_by(id, year) %>% 
  mutate(year = as.factor(year)) %>% 
  summarize(mean_tmax = mean(tmax, na.rm = TRUE),
            mean_tmin = mean(tmin, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Weather station ID: ", id, "\nYear: ", year)) %>% 
 plot_ly(
    y = ~mean_tmax, x = ~mean_tmin, color = ~year, text = ~text_label,
    type = "scatter", colors = "viridis")
```


Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B: Bar plot for average precipitation in 1991 to 2010


```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
ny_noaa %>% 
  group_by(year, prcp) %>% 
  summarise(mean_prcp = mean(prcp), na.rm = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Year: ", year, "\nAverage precipitation: ", mean_prcp)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    y = ~mean_prcp, x = ~year, color = ~as.factor(year), text = ~text_label,
    type = "bar", colors = "viridis")
```


### Chart C: Trend for average precipitation in 1991 to 2010 in each station

```{r, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
ny_noaa %>% 
  group_by(id, year) %>% 
  summarise(mean_prcp = mean(prcp), na.rm = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(text_label = str_c("Weather station ID: ", id, "\nYear: ", year, "\nAverage precipitation: ", mean_prcp)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    y = ~mean_prcp, x = ~year, color = ~id, text = ~text_label,
    type = "scatter", colors = "viridis") %>% 
  add_lines(color = ~id)
```
